skillTree.localised_description: It is whispered that those who displeased Usirian are punished in death. Forbidden to enter the golden paradise of the afterlife, they were instead condemned to the lowest depths of the Netherworld where a hive of Khepra beetles would burrow into their bodies and gnaw on their insides for all eternity.

skillTree.localised_description: Apopha's has made the study of bringing death to the living is his immortal work. He has studied the living in detail, so as to better know how to end them. The blood of the living, the waters of life, fascinate him and it's doubtful even the greatest of the mortal doctors of Aldorf have as complete a knowledge as him of blood. No mortal man can hope to stand against Apophas.

skillTree.localised_description: It is not possible to defeat such unshakeable spirit once its owner's mind is made up.
Kill many and you *are* a conqueror; godhood is then but a protracted slaughter away...
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
He whose will transcends death can strike out from beyond the grave, to devastating effect.

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit: death.
No matter how hard his enemies swipe and hack at Apophas' horrifying form, beetles' bodies swarm over to fill up wounds and missing limbs.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Death is not an impedance to the strongest of wills.
Beware the scorpion's sting, hidden 'neath the desert sands yet always poised to strike.

items.colour_text: The forever dripping blade of Prince Apophas, with which he slay the entire Numas' Royal family.

Prince Apophas' form is made of swirling scarabs, a tide of ever renewing insects. Though lacking the ability for true flight in this form, Apophas is able to muster considerable energies to give himself a burst of speed which can be terrifying for his opponents.
This blackened heart draws energies directly from Usirian's realm to empower all his servents on the mortal plains.

So thus Apophas became Usirian's Executioner, constantly roaming and seeking a creature so vile and evil to strike down that it would tip the weighing scales against his own black heart.
